# Opening and cleaning the data

```{r}
data <- read.csv('NCHS_-_Drug_Poisoning_Mortality_by_State__United_States.csv')
head(data)
```
```{r}
print(dim(data))
print(levels(data$State))
print(unique(data$Year))
print(levels(data$Sex))
print(levels(data$Age.Group))
print(levels(data$Race.and.Hispanic.Origin))
```



```{r}
print(unique(data$State))
us_data <- data[data$State == 'United States', ]
state_data <- data[data$State != 'United States', ]
```
